/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of being in the midst of the action. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a canopy of greenery and architecture. Vehicles, including a large red truck with a blue tarp covering its back, are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape.
